title.en: I Became the Tyrant of a Defense Game

altTitles.en: Tyrant of the Tower Defense Game

altTitles.zh: 成为塔防游戏里的暴君

altTitles.th: ผู้พิชิตเกมป้องกันฐาน

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en el tirano de un juego de defensa

description.en:
Protect the Empire was considered unbeatable for over a decade until streamer extraordinaire Mr. Gamer Geek comes along and defeats the game on its hardest mode. But just when he's about to rest on his laurels, he's sucked into the world of the game by some mysterious figure and thrust into Prince Ash's body!

Ash now realizes that every click and command he had mindlessly sent out had real, gruesome costs - including his teammates' lives that he sacrificed for the sake of victory. To make up for his previous actions, Ash promises to keep his whole team alive this time while using his wits and knowledge to survive the hellish onslaught of monsters. 

But who brought him to this world in the first place, and why?

Ash may soon find the answers to these questions - if he can survive the bloody battlefield first!
description.fr:
Ash était un streamer de jeux vidéo, surnommé "otaku classique".

Une fois qu'il a réussi à terminer un des jeux classiques les plus compliqués, "Protégez l'Empire", il a été aspiré dans le monde du jeu et s'est réincarné en tant que prince héritier, complètement psychopathe. Dans le jeu d'origine, il était connu comme le pire commandant qui a causé la quasi-destruction des forces armées de la ville, et qui a rencontré une fin tragique.

Cependant, Ash est déterminé à survivre en tant que commandant ''invincible''.
description.ko:
타워디펜스&던전오펜스 RPG <제국을 지켜라>
누구도 클리어하지 못한 난이도로 게임의 엔딩을 봤다.
그런데 정신을 차리니 게임 속이다.
그것도 공략이 불가능한 튜토리얼 스테이지다.
"반드시 클리어해 주마, 이 거지 같은 게임……!"
description.th: <ปกป้องอาณาจักร> เกม RPG แนวป้องกันฐานและตะลุยดันเจี้ยน เกมที่ยากจนไม่มีใครเอาชนะมันได้ แต่ฉันทำได้จนได้เห็นตอนจบ ทว่าพอตั้งสติได้ก็กลับกลายเป็นว่าฉันได้เข้ามาอยู่ในเกมแล้ว แถมยังเป็นด่านปฐมบทที่ไม่มีทางเอาชนะได้อีกต่างหาก “ฉันจะเอาชนะมันให้ได้ ไอ้เกมเสงเครงนี่น่ะ.......!”
description.zh:
重生塔防游戏里的配角，通关地狱级难度的关卡！

无人能通关的地狱级难度塔防游戏“守护帝国”。当首次通关后发现自己居然在游戏里面，还处在不可能成功突破的新手教程剧情里？！

能否再一次成功攻略地狱级难度的游戏？

altTitles.ja: アスモデウスはあきらめない

altTitles.zh: 阿斯莫德是不会放弃的！

altTitles.zh-hk: 阿斯莫德是不會放棄的！

description.en:
The manga centers on a second-year high school student who is standing in for his Catholic priest father to protect their church while his father is away. He saves a troubled beautiful young girl who is in front of his church one day, but she turns out to be the demon Asmodeus.  
  
[Alt. Raw](https://storia.takeshobo.co.jp/manga/asmodeus/)
description.pt-br: A história se foca em um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio que tomou o lugar do seu pai, um padre católico, para proteger a sua igreja enquanto ele está fora. Ele ajuda uma bela e jovem garota necessitada que estava em frente a sua igreja um dia, mas ela é na verdade Asmodeus, um demônio.

title.en: My Sister's Best Friend, My Lover.

altTitles.ja: 姉の親友、私の恋人。
Ane no Shinyuu, Watashi no Koibito.

description.en: Sena is a novelist who has been dealing with romantic feelings for her sister, Yuuna. Upon learning that Yuuna is to be married, Yuuna's best friend and former lover Kiku asks Sena to be her lover...

title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok: Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье по делам Джека Потрошителя
Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

description.en: In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!

altTitles.ja: 豚の復讐

description.en: After rampant bullying, high school boy Takeshi Hirota kills himself and is transported to another another world, where he is accepted by the orcs due to his appearance.

altTitles.en: A Mage, but Also a Scientist

description.en: This is a world where science and magic coexist. Here, some people pursue powerful magic, while others learn eternal truths. The protagonist, Blair, a mathematician who came from a different world, with left-handed magic and right-handed science, opens the door to a new world! Academic Dean? Supreme Witch? Senior Killer Brother? As an adult, I want it all!

title.en: Ore wa Seikan Kokka no Akutoku Ryoshu

altTitles.ja: 俺は星間国家の悪徳領主

altTitles.en: I'm the Evil Lord of an Intergalactic Empire!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou o Lorde Vilão da Nação Interestelar

altTitles.id: Aku adalah Penguasa Jahat dari Kekaisaran Antargalaksi!

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore wa Seikan Kokka no Akutoku Ryoshu

description.en:
In his past life, Liam was hardworking and honest. This got him nothing but debt and betrayal. Now he’s been reborn as the ruling noble of a planet.

Time for some payback.

This life he’ll grind the world under his heel! He’s only looking out for himself. All his underlings will suffer! But try as he might, his tyranny only seems to make his subjects happier.
description.id:
Liam sera banfield adalah reincarnator. dia bereinkarnasi di dunia fantasy pedang dan sihir. Tapi pada saat peradaban sudah siap membuat kemajuan ke luar angkasa, ceritanya terjadi di sebuah kerajaan antar galaksi, sebuah universitas seperti opera ruang angkasa di mana senjata humanoid dan pesawat ruang angkasa saling melengkapi. Liam, yang telah menjelma menjadi keluarga bangsawan dalam masyarakat monarki. memiliki ambisi untuk suatu hari menjadi raja jahat di kehidupan sebelumnya. sayangnya Liam telah kehilangan segalanya dan mati dalam keputusasaan. 

"sangat bodoh hidup untuk orang lain."
 "Aku akan hidup untuk diriku sendiri"

 ia mulai menuju kehidupan keduanya, tetapi malah disembah sebagai penguasa yang berbudi luhur karena perbedaan nilainya. Akankah Liam dapat dengan aman menjadi tuan yang jahat?
description.ja:
星間国家アルグランド帝国の辺境惑星を治める伯爵家に転生し、幼くして領主となったリアム・セラ・バンフィールド。持ち前の善良さ故に、妻や会社に裏切られた前世の反省から今世では“奪う側”として生きると決意する――

「悪徳領主になって、悪の限りを尽くす！」

だが、受け継いだ領地は虐げるまでもない寂れっぷりで……止む無くリアムは自領の建て直しから着手することに。人工知能を重用！ 宇宙艦隊を縮小！ 不正貴族を一刀両断！常識など無視して思うがまま傍若無人に振る舞うのだが、結果的に領民は豊かになり、好感度がうなぎ登りで……!?
description.pt-br: Liam Sera Canfield é um reincarnator. Ele reencarnou em um universo fantasioso de espada e feitiçaria, onde a civilização já avançou para o espaço sideral. A história se passa em um império intergaláctico, assim como uma space opera, com armas humanoides e batalhas de naves espaciais. Liam, que incarnou em uma família de aristocratas em uma sociedade monárquica, tem a ambição de se tornar um lorde maligno. Em sua vida anterior, liam infelizmente acabou perdendo tudo e morrendo em desespero. “ É tolice viver pelos outros.” “ Eu irei viver por mim mesmo” Com esses sentimentos no peito ele começa sua segunda vida, só que ao invés disso ele é idolatrado como um virtuoso líder por causa da diferença de valores. Será que Liam conseguirá se tornar um lorde maligno?

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

title.en: I Became a Renowned Family’s Sword Prodigy

altTitles.ru: Стал гением фехтования из великой семьи

altTitles.es-la: Me Convertí en el Prodigio de la Espada de una Familia de Renombre.

description.en:
Baek Woojin is the youngest son of a renowned swordsman family who has neither talent in swordsmanship nor an impressive Aura.
Although he was dishonored by his own family and killed, he reincarnates as the owner of a Magic Sword.

His only goal is the destruction of his own family.
description.ko:
검술 재능도, 타고난 오러도 없었지만 누구보다 열심히 노력했던 검술명가 막내아들 백우진.
가문에서 버려져 비참하게 목숨을 잃었지만,마검의 주인이 되어 10년 전으로 회귀한다.
가문을 무너뜨리겠다는 일념으로.

altTitles.en: Developers: Welcome to Game Creation Swamp

altTitles.ru: Разработчики: Добро пожаловать в болото геймдева

altTitles.ja: デベロッパーズ～ゲーム創作沼へようこそ～

description.ru: Итто Ямамото работает программистом в игровой компании. Он обожает игры, а программирование доставляет ему удовольствие. Но из-за работы в большой команде он постоянно мучился вопросом, насколько его труд действительно значим. Однажды он принял участие в игровом мероприятии, где судьба свела его с Харукой Кандзией — девушкой, разрабатывающей инди-игры! Неужели их создание может быть настолько увлекательным?! Итто с товарищами с головой погружаются в болото геймдева!

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en:
Zhou Gongjin, who was the mastermind of what happened in the Parasite Doll incident of Nine Schools Competition, has fled from Yokohama to the area of the original ancient magic users group centred around Kyoto also known as the *traditionalists*.   
Since then two months have passed and the National High School Magic Thesis Competition will soon be held again. This year's Thesis Competition is being held in Kyoto sponsored by the Magic Association and in their conference hall.   
Tatsuya gets visited by the Kuroba twins who as representatives bring Yotsuba Maya's letter to him. The letter is a request from his aunt saying "I hope for your cooperation to capture Zhou Gongjin".  
While it is questionable that whether it is a "command" rather than a "request", Tatsuya and Miyuki go to Kudou's house as they are in the centre as opponents of the traditionalists. As a result, the two siblings have a fated encounter with the "Genius Augmented Magician”.   
Conspiracy of the ancient city was the stage. The fate that has continued to smoulder away in the back of the history of magician development, Tatsuya and Miyuki and his companions are challenged.   
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 14-15.

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.ja: フールナイト

description.en:
In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

altTitles.ru: Поднятие уровня начиная с максимального возможного

description.en:
Max-level internal arts, max-level external arts.

Jianghu, Murim’s famous and strongest, Cha Shin Hyeon.

I came back to Earth after reaching the peak of martial arts, but why has everything changed so much?

A world where monsters are coming out of dungeons, and hunters are leveling up via their status windows.

‘Start again from level one? That doesn’t phase me at all, since my martial arts are already at the max level.’
description.fr:
Arts extérieurs au maximum. Arts internes au maximum.
Cha Shin-Hyun, l’être le plus fort, fidèle à son nom, dans le monde des arts martiaux.

Après avoir terminé les arts martiaux et être retourné sur Terre, les choses semblent avoir bien changé.
C’est maintenant un monde où les monstres sortent des donjons et où les chasseurs augmentent leur niveau grâce à leur fenêtre d’état.

Tu commences au niveau 1 ? Qui s’en soucie ? Mes arts martiaux sont déjà au niveau maximum.
description.ko:
외공만렙, 내공만렙
강호무림의 명실상부한 천하제일인 차신현.

무공의 끝에 도달하고 지구로 귀환했는데, 어째 뭔가 많이 달라져 있다?
던전에서 몬스터가 튀어나오고 헌터가 상태창으로 레벨을 올리는 세상.

'1레벨부터 시작이라고? 
 아무렴 어떠냐. 
 이미 내 무공은 만렙이거든.'
description.ru:
Вы достигли максимального уровня.
Ча Шин Хён бесспорно лучший в мире. Почему после конца пустоты и возвращения, Земля настолько изменилась?
Мир, в котором монстры выходят из подземелий, и охотники повышающие уровень за счет окна статуса.
«Начать с 1 уровня? Что же мне делать, если я уже достиг максимального уровня?»
description.pt-br:
Artes internas de nível máximo, artes externas de nível máximo...
Cha Shin Hyeon, o mais famoso e mais forte de Murim, de Jianghu.
'Voltei para a Terra depois de atingir o auge das artes marciais, mas por que tudo mudou tanto?
Um mundo onde os monstros estão saindo das masmorras e os caçadores estão subindo de nível por meio de suas janelas de status.
Começar de novo a partir do nível um? Não importa, as minhas artes marciais já estão no nível máximo.'

altTitles.zh: 魔王建造地下城转生到异世界建造人外娘

altTitles.en: I Became the Demon Lord so I Created a Dungeon and Spend Heartwarming Time There with Non-Human Girls
Now I'm a Demon Lord! Happily Ever After with Monster Girls in My Dungeon

description.en:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
description.ja: 異世界転生したユキは、気付くとダンジョンの魔王になっていた!? チートな強さで人外娘達を助けたり、超便利なカタログ通販（？）でダンジョンに凶悪な罠を仕掛けたりとやりたい放題。自由と平和を守るため、快適＆最凶ダンジョン造りを目指せ！ 人気WEB小説コミカライズ!!
description.es-la: Antes de darme cuenta, me había convertido en el guardián de una mazmorra, un Señor Demonio. De repente, estaba en un mundo peligroso con monstruos gigantes holgazaneando, luchando por la existencia de la mazmorra para no morir, pero por alguna razón estaba pasando un buen momento ... ¿Cómo resultó esto? El protagonista, Yuki, usa sus sentidos audaces y agudos y pasa el tiempo con una niña dragón suprema y una niña vampiro; A veces riendo, a veces enojándose, pasando días haciendo lo que le gusta.
description.pt-br:
Antes que eu percebesse, eu havia me tornado o guardião de uma masmorra, um Lorde Demônio.  De repente, eu estava em um mundo perigoso com monstros gigantes vagando por aí, lutando por sua existência, então pensei em desenvolver a masmorra para não morrer, mas – por algum motivo eu estava me divertindo bastante….  Como ficou assim?

 O protagonista, Yuki, tendo que viver naquele mundo agora, usa seus sentidos ousados ​​e afiados e passa o tempo com uma suprema garota dragão e uma garota vampira;  Às vezes rindo, às vezes com raiva, passando dias fazendo o que gosta.

altTitles.ja: ヨメガキッす

description.en:
Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
description.ja: クソ真面目で融通が利かない男子高校生・鈴紀光太郎は生意気な後輩ギャル・百舌そら子と犬猿の仲。そんな二人には秘密が…それは二人が許嫁関係で同棲していること!? 資産家の家族を持つそら子と結婚をする条件で、光太郎は潰れる寸前の父の会社を買収してもらっていたのだ!! あの手この手（エッ●なこと）で責めるメスガキそら子にたいし、光太郎は彼女を屈服させ、無事に結婚をすることができるのか――!!?

altTitles.en: The Reality of a Co-ed High School

altTitles.ja: 共学高校のゲンジツ

description.en: A comedic take on the daily lives of students in a co-ed high school.
description.ja:
チャンスなら転がっている！！ちょっとだけドキドキする……でも、進展しない！！盛り上がりそうで盛り上がらない毎日を悶々と過ごす男女の人間模様を描く、全く新しい草食系恋愛コメディー。

---

Chansunara korogatte iru!! Chotto dake dokidoki suru…… demo, shinten shinai!! Moriagari-sōde moriagaranai mainichi o monmon to sugosu danjo no ningen moyō o kaku, mattaku atarashī sōshoku-kei ren'ai komedī.

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.en: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
description.pl: W obliczu dnia zagłady, Ling Mo przebudził wewnątrz siebie specjalną moc. Odkrył on, że może kontrolować zombie. Dlatego mógł bezpiecznie przejść przez tłum zombie i przeżyć, a ostatecznie spotkał swoją ukochaną dziewczynę - Ye Lian, ale tylko by dowiedzieć się, że została już przekształcona w zombie. Aby pomóc Ye odzyskać swoje wspomnienia, Ling Mo rozpoczął swoje przetrwanie podczas apokalipsy.
description.es-la: Ante el día del juicio final, el poder especial dentro de Ling Mo fue despertado. Él se percató que podía controlar a los zombis. Debido a su poder, podía caminar sano y salvo a través de la multitud de zombis, y eventualmente se reunió con su amada novia, Ye Lian, pero solo para descubrir que ella ya se había transformado en un zombi. Para ayudarla a recuperar sus recuerdos, Ling Mo comenzó su supervivencia en el día del juicio final.
description.pt-br: Diante do apocalypse, o poder especial dentro de Ling Mo foi despertado. Ele descobriu que podia controlar os zumbis. Por causa de seu poder, Ele podia caminhar em segurança através de hordas de zumbis, e, eventualmente, ele se reencontrou com sua amada namorada – Ye Lian, Apenas para descobrir que ela já havia se transformado em um zumbi. Para ajudá-la a recuperar suas memórias, Ling Mo embarca em uma jornada para sobreviver no apocalypse.

altTitles.ja: 同居人が不安定でして

description.en: A story about the daily lives of two roommates, Fuantei-san, a slightly unstable illustrator, and Shikkari-san, a capable career woman.

One night a mysterious and unexplained phenomenon occurs in the nine provinces. Five years later Chu Feng, a regular outer disciple of the Azure Dragon school, awakens one of the mysterious nine lightning beasts. And discovers an egg sealed inside him.  
  
From there we follow Chu Feng on his path of cultivation.

altTitles.ja: 不揃いの連理

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

His only escape is his favorite online game, and the friends he’s made within. But when he plans an offline meetup for his party, he gets the surprise of his life…! [Kodansha]

description.en: A high school boy, Yomi Hashiba, is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai, a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago, is thinking... One day, while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai, he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling) This is the beginning of a thrilling coming-of-age romantic comedy about love and kanji!
description.id: Seorang anak SMA, Yomi Hashiba, sedang bermasalah. Dia tidak dapat memahami apa yang dipikirkan Mizuki Hanai, seorang gadis keren yang menjadi pacarnya sebulan yang lalu... Suatu hari, ketika dia mengkhawatirkan hubungannya dengan Mizuki Hanai, dia mulai memahami "Kanji" -nya... ? (pengucapan yang sama dengan perasaan) Ini adalah awal dari komedi romantis dewasa yang mendebarkan tentang cinta dan kanji!
description.es-la: Un chico de preparatoria, Yomi Hashiba, está preocupado. No puede entender lo que está pensando Mizuki Hanai, una chica genial que se convirtió en su novia hace un mes... Un día, mientras se preocupa por su relación con Mizuki Hanai, comienza a entender su "Kanji"... ? (caracter/sentimiento) ¡Este es el comienzo de una emocionante comedia romántica sobre la mayoría de edad sobre el amor y los kanji!

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

title.en: Hell Mode: Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru

altTitles.en: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing

altTitles.ja: ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market.

Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds.

All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

altTitles.ja: 雪解けとアガパンサス

description.en:
Natsuki, the prince of an all-girls school meets an innocent (girl) transfer student, Shun, who doesn't treat Natsuki like a prince, but instead treats her as a "friend."

Natsuki excels in everything she does and even has a fan club at school.
Even though she was looked at with admiration, her days were somehow unfulfilled...

Although Natsuki feels uncomfortable with her first "friend", Shun's innocent smile and bright personality make Natsuki's heart flutter...?

altTitles.vi: Các Hiệp sĩ trong khu Vực

altTitles.th: อัศวินในพื้นที่

altTitles.ja: エリアの騎士

description.en:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).
description.pt-br: Suguru e Kakeru são dois irmãos que jogam futebol como ninguém. Suguru, aos 15 anos, já se tornou estrela da seleção japonesa; já Kakeru? bem, ele é tão talentoso quanto o irmão, mas decidiu abandonar os gramados e atuar só como auxiliar técnico depois de um acidente na oitava série. Claro, Suguru sabe do talento que o irmão tem e não se conforma com a decisão dele. O que poderá acontecer para que Kakeru mude de ideia e volte a ajudar o time de dentro de campo, onde seu irmão o espera??

title.en: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga

altTitles.ja: 奴隷からの期待と評価のせいで搾取できないのだが

altTitles.en: Due to Their Appreciation and Expectations, I Can't Exploit My Slaves

description.en: A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, "Restoration." Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye. The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
description.ja:
転生した少年・アレンは女神からチート能力【再生】を授かる。
ありとあらゆるケガや病気を治療できるものの、活躍の場は限られるため、奴隷の少女たちを【再生】し、ハーレムスローライフを送ろうと画策する。
だが、完治した奴隷たちのチートがダンチすぎて、農作物や居住環境は瞬く間に完熟。
活躍の場を次々に奪われる主人公・アレンは現代知識で対抗するが、それも優秀な奴隷たちが吸収し、商売で大成功。
主人公の影がどんどん薄くなっていく……！？

altTitles.en: We Kissed Even Though We Are Just Friends

description.en: Aoi and Keita, who attend the same high school, live next door to each other and have been childhood friends ever since Keita moved in when they were in middle school. Even though they're just friends who always goof around together, Aoi suddenly notices that Keita has been looking cool lately...

altTitles.vi: Quá mệt mỏi với việc bị con bạn thuở nhỏ kiêm bạn gái bắt nạt, tôi đã chia tay với em ấy

altTitles.en: I’m Sick and Tired of My Childhood Friend’s, Now Girlfriend’s, Constant Abuse so I Broke up With Her

description.en:
My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true, right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I can’t take it anymore.

So I’m left with no choice, I’m going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity, it’s the only option.

And thus, the story of my break up begins…
description.pt-br: Minha amiga de infância também é minha namorada. Um sonho realizado, certo? De jeito nenhum, ela me insulta diariamente, ela destrói minha dignidade e isso afeta meu bem-estar mental, não aguento mais. Então não tenho escolha, terminarei com ela. Para manter minha sanidade, é a única opção.

altTitles.ja: 零れちゃうから、聴いててね

altTitles.en: It’s going to spill, please listen to it

description.en: A story about a Vtuber and a blue collar worker that scared of his own moaning.

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

title.en: Ore ni wa Kono Kuragari ga Kokochiyo Katta: Zetsubou kara Hajimaru Isekai Seikatsu, Kami no Kimagure de Kyousei Haishinchuu

altTitles.ja: 俺にはこの暗がりが心地よかった　―絶望から始まる異世界生活、神の気まぐれで強制配信中―

altTitles.en: The Darkness Was Comfortable for Me

description.en:
“I will have the 1,000 people I have chosen go to a parallel world.”

Chaos spread once those words of God were displayed to the whole world.

Kurose Hikaru, whose childhood friend had been chosen, was killed together with her on the same day she was supposed to be transferred. However, for some reason, Hikaru didn’t die and, even though he wasn’t chosen at first, he ended up as one of the [Otherworlders that will have all their actions live broadcasted to Earth].

Transferred without any preparations at all to that accursed land, he faced threats innumerable times and somehow managed to survive with his Gift, the Dark Spirit Abilities.

“I must not die. I am sure the people on Earth are all rooting for me after all…”

This is the story of a young boy who is tossed about by the gazes of the viewers, yet eventually manages to raise his head and walk forward.
(NovelUpdates)

altTitles.en: If You Corrupt the Heroine's First Love
Corrupting Your Heroine's First Love Will Result With This

description.en:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: 雪女と蟹を食う

description.en: A certain summer day, as the cicadas sing loudly. A man with no money and no place to belong tries to end his life, however is unable to take the last step. While wavering between life and death, he sees a gourmet food program on television, and realising he's never once eaten crab in his life decides that "For my last day on this Earth, I'll eat crab". Settings his sights on the wife who lives in a high-class neighbourhood that he happened across in a library, he forces his way into her home. And thus, he demands money from her, however… things go in an unexpected direction.

True Heavens Continent is a place where those with great power can move mountains and overturn seas, kick the stars and step on the moon, punch through the sky and even shatter the earth itself! Ye Ming, a commoner born into a side branch within his family, sincerely and diligently tried to become stronger, hoping to avenge his parents’ deaths. As fate would have it, he obtained the "Divine Spirit Cloak", ingested the "Foundation Establishment Divine Pill", and cultivated the "Omnipotent Sutra". With his newfound power, Ye Ming begins his path of vengeance, mercilessly slaughtering any martial artists that dare stand in his way!In the face of deadly threats all across the continent, such as the Immortal Dynasty, the Great Eternal Sect, the Giant Barren Demon, and the Supreme Demon God, Ye Ming is determined that nothing will stop him! Whether god or demon, Ye Ming fears nothing! “I shall be the one who decides my own destiny!”
description.es: Ye Ming, a estrela em ascensão da Família Ye é considerado um gênio entre seus companheiros. Mas ele foi enganado por seu primo ciumento e ele cortou seus meridianos, aleijou suas habilidades e o abanou impiedosamente. Mas Ye Ming nunca desiste, porque ele sacrificaria tudo para se vingar de seus pais falecidos que foram assassinados pela família Huang. Mas ele não sabe que é considerado uma dor no pescoço para a família Ye, e uma grande conspiração paira na escuridão…
description.ru:
/ Русское  
||Мин Е, восходящая звезда семьи Е, - гений среди своих сверстников-культиваторов. Но его двоюродный брат повредил ему меридианы, искалечил и безжалостно порезал сухожилия. Мин Е не сдается, потому что он пожертвовал бы всем, чтобы отомстить за своих умерших родителей, которые были убиты семьей Хуан. Он не знает, что его считают занозой в шее для семьи Е и хотят его убрать…||
description.zh: "天元大陆，有大能力者可移山倒海，踢星踏月，拳破青天，脚碎大地！ 叶铭，一介凡流，庶子出身，为报血仇，自强不息。 机缘之下，获“神灵宝衣”，服“筑基神丹”，修“通天经图”。 心诚志竖，勇猛精进，凡挡修武之路者，杀无赦！ 不朽皇朝，万古大教，洪荒巨妖，擎天魔神，面对这漫天神魔，他无所畏惧，我命在我不在天！"
description.pt-br: O True Heavens Continent é um lugar onde aqueles com grande poder podem mover montanhas e derrubar mares, chutar as estrelas e pisar na lua, perfurar o céu e até mesmo destruir a própria terra! Ye Ming, um plebeu nascido em um ramo secundário de sua família, tentou sincera e diligentemente se tornar mais forte, na esperança de vingar a morte de seus pais. Como quis o destino, ele obteve a “Capa do Espírito Divino”, ingeriu a “Pílula Divina do Estabelecimento de Fundação” e cultivou o “Sutra Onipotente”. Com seu novo poder, Ye Ming inicia seu caminho de vingança, massacrando impiedosamente qualquer artista marcial que ouse ficar em seu caminho! Diante de ameaças mortais em todo o continente, como a Dinastia Imortal, a Grande Seita Eterna, o Gigante Estéril Demônio, e o Deus Demônio Supremo, Ye Ming está determinado a que nada o deterá! Seja deus ou demônio, Ye Ming não teme nada! “Serei eu quem decidirá meu próprio destino!

description.en: Tensions are brewing under the seemingly calm surface of the Vasilios Empire, a kingdom ruled by the Imperial Family and the Temple. Lady Medea Solon has lost her place next to Crown Prince Eros, but resolves to do whatever it will take to win back what's rightfully hers. Will she reclaim her throne?

altTitles.ja: カテキン

description.en: 2nd grade junior high school kid Shirai Sachi (14-years old) gets tutored by the beautiful and easy-going woman Chabatake Nana (21-years old). Although she slacks off when tutoring, actually not helping his studies at all, for Sachi it's all fine and dandy. Being alone together with a hot, older woman in his own bedroom, frolicking around, unintentionally revealing neathage, or just lying down on his bed, with her bare long legs or the cleavage of her ample breasts in perfect view. Who could complain? It's an adolescent boy's fantasy fulfilled!

description.en: The student Nakatani Yuto was supposed to be having a regular life, however his whole class was transferred to another world. All the students gained powerful skills and were worshipped as heroes, but for Yuto who got the unfavorable skill [Absorption]...! ?
description.ja: 高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて――…!?
